page.title: 02A COUNTRY WALK IN THE CITY.
page.content: THE PATH STARTS IN CARLETON AT A STONE STILE OPPOSITE SAINT CHRISTOPHERS RESTAURANT. THE FIELD PATH LEADS TO THE RIVER PETTERIL. TURN RIGHT TOWARDS TOWN.YOU RISE UP AN INCLINE WHERE THE PATH IS ERODED AWAY, THROUGH A GAP IN THE FENCE, AND ACROSS A WORN PATH IN THE CENTRE OF THE FIELD .THE RIVER CUTS BACK INTO THE PATH HERE.GO OVER A STILE AND ALONG A PATH IN THE CENTRE OF THE FIELD TO ANOTHER STILE.THE PATH LEADS ACROSS A PLAYING FIELD AND THROUGH A GAP INTO A MEADOW. FOLLOW THE RIVER,UP A SMALL BANK AND OVER A BRIDGE CROSSING THE RIVER.THIS PATH LEADS STRAGHT TO A ROAD. WHEN CROSSING TAKE CARE.OPPOSITE IS A TRACK WHICH LEADS PAST A RAILWAY CLUB. THE TRACK PASSES THROUGH TWO GATES, DOWN ANOTHER PATH, MEETING UP WITH THE RIVER.THIS PATH ENDS AT THE HILLTOP HOTEL.
